question: Which among the following are being procured by India for its armed forces, under the Project-75 India (P-75I) Programme?
explanation: Under Project 75, six Scorpene submarines are being built with assistance and technology transfer from DCNS of France under deal signed in October 2005. The Project 75I-class submarine is a follow-on of the Project 75 Kalvari-class submarine for the Indian navy.
